body_html: Update: I have a patch to sccache for making it work with clang-cl. @peterjc123 and I are currently looking at building LLVM from source to address this issue, afterwards we will be able to use clang-cl as a drop-in replacement for cl.exe.
body_text: Update: I have a patch to sccache for making it work with clang-cl. @peterjc123 and I are currently looking at building LLVM from source to address this issue, afterwards we will be able to use clang-cl as a drop-in replacement for cl.exe.
body: Update: I have a patch to sccache for making it work with clang-cl. @peterjc123 and I are currently looking at building LLVM from source to address [this issue](https://github.com/mozilla/sccache/issues/246), afterwards we will be able to use clang-cl as a drop-in replacement for cl.exe.
